title: Python Crash Course
author: Eric Matthes
content: A hands-on introduction to Python with real-world projects, covering data structures, web apps, and game development.

title: Clean Code
author: Robert C. Martin
content: A fundamental book on writing clean, maintainable, and efficient code, with real-world examples and refactoring techniques.

title: JavaScript: The Good Parts
author: Douglas Crockford
content: A classic book that highlights the best features of JavaScript while avoiding its pitfalls, ideal for intermediate and advanced developers.

title: The Alignment Problem: Machine Learning and Human Values
author: Brian Christian
content: A deep exploration of AI alignment, discussing ethical concerns, reinforcement learning, and the challenges of ensuring AI systems reflect human values.
